name: Basic Crepes
directions: Whisk eggs, milk, water, and salt in a large bowl.
Add flour and melted butter, whisking until smooth and lump-free.
Let batter rest for 10–15 minutes to improve texture.
Heat a lightly oiled nonstick pan over medium-high heat.
Pour about 1/4 cup (60 ml) of batter into the pan and tilt in a circular motion to coat evenly.
Cook until the top is set and bottom is lightly browned, 1–2 minutes.
Loosen edges with a spatula, flip, and cook the other side until lightly browned, about 1 minute more.
Repeat with remaining batter, stacking crepes and serving warm with desired fillings.
